subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r23597 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/script:
	.
body:
On Mon, Jun 25, 2007 at 09:48:42PM +0200, Jelmer Vernooij wrote:
> On Mon, Jun 25, 2007 at 08:59:00AM -0700, James Peach wrote:
> > On Jun 25, 2007, at 8:43 AM, Volker Lendecke wrote:
> > >On Mon, Jun 25, 2007 at 10:35:42AM -0500, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
> > >>>Wait a second -- what is going on HERE???
> > >>Just reporting.    See my mail to samba-technical.
> > >I was just extremely surprised as it seems that I have been
> > >the only one interested in the 80-column thing so far.
> > I'm an 80-column fan too :)
> Same here. It looks like we're a larger crowd than we thought we
> were. :-)

I hate 80 column limits. Just thought you should know :-)
